title: Aleksandr Balakhonov
text:
Aleksandr Alekseyevich Balakhonov (; born 26 June 2002) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Rotor-2%20Volgograd">FC Rotor-2 Volgograd</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut for the main squad of <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a> on 21 October 2020 in a <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="PFC%20Krylia%20Sovetov%20Samara">PFC Krylia Sovetov Samara</a>.
